description.value: The whispers of the jungle grant you more diverse access to simple primal magic. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Dancing Lights]{Dancing Lights}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Disrupt Undead]{Disrupt Undead} and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Tanglefoot]{Tanglefoot} as innate primal spells at will. If you chose one of those spells with Wildborn Magic, you can select a new spell for Wildborn Magic.
